name: Shooting Over It with Vikingos Team
name_original: Shooting Over It with Vikingos Team
description:
Shooting Over It with Vikingos Team

Shooting Over It with Vikingos Team is a Weekly Game Jam submissions for the week 110!!

The theme of the Game Jam was 'Floating Sky Islands' . We had a lot of fun making this game, this is our first game jam ever! and we hope been in other ones!

Enjoy and have Fun!
